articles.summary: Brady Swenson, co-founder of the Bitcoin-focused financial services platform Swan, unleashed a series of accusations against Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse on January 29 via X. He accused him of misleading investors, pushing exaggerated narratives, and profiting at others' expense.

articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: Tether is integrating with the Bitcoin network, Paolo Ardoino announced at a Bitcoin conference in El Salvador. Tether is the largest stablecoin and is the third largest in terms of market value after Bitcoin and Litecoin.

articles.title: South Korean P2P CEO accused of using client funds to buy crypto
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: The CEO of a major South Korean P2P lender has been accused of using funds for a construction project to make personal crypto purchases. According to local media outlet NBN Media, an unnamed investor and private equity is involved in the case.   nbnmedia.com

articles.title: US State of Indiana Seeks Bitcoin ETF Exposure for Retirement Funds
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: Jake Teshka, representative of the US state of Indiana, has introduced a bill to seek Bitcoin ETF exposure for retirement funds. The regulated BTC ETFs made strong inroads into the US market last year with the total assets exceeding $1 billion.

articles.title: Illinois Poised To Lead US With First-Ever Bitcoin Reserve
articles.author: 99 Bitcoins
articles.summary: Illinois is on the verge of becoming the first US state to establish a Bitcoin Reserve as part of its fiscal strategy. The proposed legislation, known as the Strategic BTC Reserve Act, was introduced by Illinois State Representative John Cabello and referred to the Rules Committee on 29 January 2025.

The Securities and Exchange Commission is adopting a more accommodative approach to crypto-friendly policies. Crypto exchange Kraken has reinvented itself as a bridge for people to access the crypto space and participate in related activities.

articles.title: Bitcoin Exchange Supply Shock Not Real: Glassnode Busts Myth
articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.summary: Glassnode has revealed that the Bitcoin exchange supply hasn't declined much in recent months. The on-chain analytics firm has discussed this in its latest weekly report. It is a misconception that's widely held in the Bitcoin community around the decline of the exchange supply.

articles.title: Cybersecurity In 2025: Financial Services, Critical Infrastructure And Government Cybersecurity Insights And Predictions
articles.author: Article – Yubico
articles.summary: Yubico's experts share their predictions on the future of cybersecurity and authentication in the financial services, critical infrastructure and government cybersecurity regulations globally. The financial sector recently surpassed healthcare as the most breached and attacked industry. Governments will focus on mandating and enforcing regulations around cybersecurity and Zero Trust practices globally in the future.

articles.title: Commission's $221.6m FTX claim to now drop below other creditors
articles.author: NEIL HARTNELL
articles.summary: Supreme Court has approved the Securities Commission's bid to subordinate its $221.55m claim against FTX behind those of the insolvent crypto exchange's clients and other victims. The Securities Commission is in the process of negotiating a settlement for penalties related to anti-money laundering and counter terror financing breaches with FTX's Bahamian liquidators.
